author: aheritier
msg: MPPMD-21 : New properties "maven.pmd.failonerror" and "maven.pmd.failonruleviolation" to fail the build if any errors or problems are found.

author: joerg
msg: Fixed bugzilla issue 37379. The construction of the transaction specific path is now done in a protected method getTransactionBaseDir(Object txId) to allow easy sub classing where the trivial way is not sufficient.

author: aheritier
msg: MPPMD-13 : New property "maven.pmd.console" to display pmd errors to the console.
